name: American Standard Version
copyright: Scripture quotations from the 1901 American Standard Version. It is in the public domain.

name: Byzantine Greek New Testament
copyright: Scripture quotations from the 2018 Robinson-Pierpont edition of the Greek New Testament in the Original Greek, Byzantine Majority Text. It is in the public domain.

name: King James Version
copyright: Scripture quotations from The Authorized King James Version of the Holy Bible, using the standardized text of 1769. It is in the public domain.

name: Clementine Latin Vulgate
copyright: Scripture quotations from Clementine Vulgate of 1598 with Glossa Ordinaria Migne edition 1880 in Latin. It is in the public domain.

name: World English Bible Classic
copyright: Scripture quotations are taken from The World English Bible™ of eBible.org, 2020 stable text edition. It is in the public domain.

name: Scripture quotations from Young’s Literal Translation of the Holy Bible, by Robert Young, 1898 edition. It is in the public domain.
